remarks: Define the collection of walks with particular endpoints (in an un- directed graph).  This corresponds to the "x0-x(l)-walks", see Definition in [Bollobas] p. 5.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens and Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2017.)

$d a b e f p v $.
